projects.name: Build music searching system
Responsibilities: Crawl music and music lyrics from music websites
Build keyword and lyric query model
Achievements: Create a self-modified system to solve search lyrics problem
Vietnamese music and music lyrics dataset

projects.name: Optical character recognition (OCR) for in-the-wild images
Responsibilities: Survey on several OCR techniques for Vietnamese address domain
Design a model to extract text from Vietnamese address image
Achievements: Design a pipeline for Vietnamese address images
Build full OCR pipeline for Vietnamese address images

projects.name: Create poem from image
Responsibilities: Create the model with input as image and output as Vietnamese poem related to the input image
Achievements: Design the framework for the problem
Design the suitable data format for the framework
Survey people about the generated poem from the model
Thesis report about the model and the dataset

projects.name: Counting cars in the video (AI Challenge)
Achievements: Have a first impression in AI competition
A tracking video model for car traffic video
Survey people about the generated poem from the model
Achieve the 17th rank out of 53 teams

projects.name: Traffic sign detection (Zalo AI Challenge)
Responsibilities: Coding the augmentation for the dataset
Achievements: The augmentation pipeline for the traffic sign dataset
